mapper.delete: delete from cms_lock where lock_name = #{lockName} and locked_by = #{processId}
mapper.select: select cv.var_id as id, cv.var_name as name, cv.var_value as value, cv.updated_by as updatedBy, cv.created as created, cv.updated as updated from cms_vars cv where cv.var_name = #{name}

select * from ( select d.deployment_id as deploymentId, round((extract(epoch from (now() - max(dr.updated))) / 60)) as stuckMinsBack, max(dr.updated) as stuckAt, n.ns_path as path from dj_deployment d, dj_deployment_rfc dr, ns_namespaces n where d.state_id = 100 and d.deployment_id = dr.deployment_id and dr.state_id in (200,300) and d.ns_id=n.ns_id and not exists (select 1 from dj_deployment_rfc where deployment_id = d.deployment_id and state_id = 100) group by d.deployment_id, n.ns_path ) as aggr where stuckMinsBack > 10

select * from ( select d.deployment_id as deploymentId, round((extract(epoch from (now() - max(dr.updated))) / 60)) as stuckMinsBack, max(dr.updated) as stuckAt, n.ns_path as path from dj_deployment d, dj_deployment_rfc dr, ns_namespaces n where d.state_id = 100 and d.ns_id=n.ns_id and d.deployment_id = dr.deployment_id group by d.deployment_id, n.ns_path) as aggr where stuckMinsBack > 7

select * from ( select d.deployment_id as deploymentId, round((extract(epoch from (now() - max(dr.updated))) / 60)) as stuckMinsBack, max(dr.updated) as stuckAt, n.ns_path as path from dj_deployment d, dj_deployment_rfc dr, ns_namespaces n where d.state_id = 500 and d.ns_id=n.ns_id and d.deployment_id = dr.deployment_id and dr.state_id = 100 group by d.deployment_id, n.ns_path) as aggr where stuckMinsBack > 7
